name: DATE_TRUNC
description: Truncates a date/timestamp to the specified unit precision.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Precision unit (YEAR, QUARTER, MONTH, WEEK, DAY, HOUR, MINUTE, SECOND)

examples.title: Truncate to month
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC(created_at, MONTH) as month_start FROM orders

examples.title: Group by day
examples.sql:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC(timestamp, DAY) as day, COUNT(*) as count
FROM events
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC(timestamp, DAY)

examples.title: Truncate to hour
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC(event_time, HOUR) as hour FROM logs

notes: Useful for grouping by time periods
